name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 2, in Xiantao, Hubei, the well-known local supermarket chain Fu Di Supermarket went bankrupt. Employees blocked the road in front of the supermarket to defend their rights. It is reported that in March, many citizens still had Fu Di Supermarket shopping cards in their hands, which caused multiple rounds of looting.
That afternoon, the municipal government urgently notified all government personnel in the city to cancel the Qingming Festival holiday and not to use shopping cards to go shopping at Fu Di Supermarket.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: People rush to buy at Fu Di Supermarket

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Fudi employees demanding wages

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is said online that the collapse of Fu Di Supermarket was suspected to be due to the fact that the funds such as supplier payments and government subsidies were transferred abroad by the boss's son through a shell company.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Follow-up
Senior high school students have been granted a delay in returning to school

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Students posted a manifesto on the notice board accusing the school leaders of severely squeezing students' meal time and even not allowing students to wash their hair at noon

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of April 3, Dezhou No. 2 Middle School did not have a Qingming Festival holiday. Some students burned paper in front of the school to protest.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/sPbkpU9luL

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 3, it was revealed online that a senior high school boy from Hainan Middle School was caught using his mobile phone to secretly photograph the girl next door while she was using the toilet in the female toilet. He also harassed other female students in the second year of high school. Angry students wrote down the student's evil deeds in the audience seats of the school playground with chalk and demanded that he drop out of school.
After learning about this, the school tried to suppress it and wiped off the graffiti on the wall three times in one day. The school claimed that the student was under great psychological pressure and was afraid that it would affect his future as the college entrance examination was approaching, so it would not punish him. A student from Hainan Middle School said in a forum that the school would deduct five quantitative points for being late, but repeated cheating and secretly photographing the female toilet were ignored because they wanted to take care of the senior high school students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At 3 pm on April 3, on the Chongqing Yangtze River Lijiatuo Bridge, a BYD Song's brake failure caused a four-car chain collision.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 3, Shanwei, Guangdong. A man was arrested at Haifeng Rural Commercial Bank on suspicion of bank robbery. The video showed that the glass door outside the ATM machine showed signs of being smashed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 3, a strange scene occurred in Shagou Community, Baode County, Yizhou City, Shanxi Province. The video showed that after a family got into a black car, they directly ran over the children playing in front of the car while reversing, and drove away from the scene after pausing for a moment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 3, the media reported that Jin Zongbo, the whistleblower of the Qilianshan 100 billion yuan mining case, fell to his death at his residence in Xi'an at around 3 am on April 3.
Jin Zongbo's friend said, "We talked in October last year. He lamented that he had lost everything after nearly 20 years of defending his rights. He also sold his only house to pay off debts. His body was also worn out, and the complications of diabetes became more and more serious. He said that what was worse was that in April, his brother had a sudden cerebral infarction, and they didn't even have money to eat for a while."
In 2023, after Ma Shaowei encountered financial difficulties in the development of a coalfield in Qinghai Province, he sold the company's equity "one share and two shares", which triggered a 100 billion yuan mining rights dispute. Jin Zongbo is one of the victims of this dispute. Since the end of 2006, Jin Zongbo has submitted more than 700 letters of appeal, accusation and denunciation. The various paper materials were packed in 13 boxes, which were piled up nearly four meters high. On June 12, 2017, Jin Zongbo made a public report under his real name.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 4, Shanxi. A netizen shared a chat record of a leader of Postal Bank punishing employees. The chat record showed that the leader required all employees in the listed branches to jump two tigers and they had to complete the jumps. After the jumps, they had to post the video in the group.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 3, Panyu, Guangdong. At the demolition site of Shaxi Village, a large number of urban management officers held shields and formed a human wall to block the owners who disagreed with the demolition from leaving their houses. According to local residents, the compensation for demolition was only 1,500 yuan per square meter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 4, Nanchang, Jiangxi Province. At around 10:10 am, at Chaonong Street and Yongle Road in Nanchang City, a silver sedan knocked down a pedestrian crossing the zebra crossing while turning, and then rushed towards a mother and daughter in front of a supermarket.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/rorFn08Hxq

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 4, Zhengzhou, Henan. Qianxi Square was filled with police and plainclothes officers to prevent people from mourning Li Keqiang on Qingming Festival.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/yAoWTpUkFR

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, Meituan is unable to place an order to send flowers to Li Keqiang's former residence on Hongxing Road in Hefei, indicating that delivery service is not available in the current area

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 3, when the earthquake occurred in Taiwan, the door leading to the playground of Wenzhou Dongou Middle School was locked during the escape process, resulting in thousands of students being trapped in a small square. Some students called the earthquake evacuation "Dungou Middle School's Dunkirk Retreat". In a student group called "Dungou Middle School Junior High School Class of 2021", a student revealed that when the incident happened, the teacher asked the students to sit down and continue the class, but he ran away, while the students stayed in the classroom. There was a stampede when the students evacuated, and some students fell. Someone else said in the message area that the principal asked not to post the incident online.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Many netizens said that Li Keqiang's former residence on Hongxing Road in Hefei was heavily guarded during the Qingming Festival, with so many police officers that they didn't even dare to take pictures.
